feed.title: Requestly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Requestly: Extension release v23.3.3
entry.content:
• Show modifications on top URL in extension popup and browser console.
  • No need to refresh website after modifying or toggling Modify Request/Response rules.
  • Added support for capturing cross-origin iframes in Session Recording.
  • Bug fix: Clicking on View Recording showed Something went wrong error.
  • Bug fix: Early console logs were not captured in Session Recording.
  • Bug fix: Rules with bad regex conditions impacted execution of other rules.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: January 21, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

New

  • Resource Override Importer, enabling import of configuration from Resource Override.
  • Markdown support added for collection overview tab.
  • Autocompletion of variables added.

Improvements

  • Deep links in API Client tabs.
  • Sort Collections Alphabetically for easier accessibility.
  • API Client history screen shows a message that API client history is stored in local storage.
  • Collections are collapsed by default when imported

Bug Fixes

  • Handled unsaved changes of environment variables lost upon opening the importer modal.
  • Codemirror Cursor bug fixed [when typing fast cursor sets at the beginning of editor]
  • Request Body & Response Body are loaded prettified by default in API Client.
  • Secret values in auto-complete dropdown of API Client are hidden now.
  • Inconsistency of tabs switching in API Client.
  • Unsaved changes of the request get lost on duplicating it.
  • Query params are now saved in history.
  • API client - Current values get cleared out on switching workspace
